description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Balanced, Force

Note: Space Marines Only. Space Wolves variant Astartes Force Staff. When striking a foe and making a focus power test to do additional damage, can instead trigger one of the wielders Psychic Powers as a Free Action which has a Psy Rating of 1 per DoS scored on target. Can only use Psychic Powers that have a specific target, which will be the one hit. Wielder must be a Rune Priest.

system.notes: Space Marines Only.  Space Wolves variant Astartes Force Staff.
